name: ag-charts-community
description: Advanced Charting / Charts supporting Javascript / Typescript / React / Angular / Vue

scripts.test:ci: export FONTCONFIG_PATH=$PWD/src/chart/test ; export FONTCONFIG_FILE=$PWD/src/chart/test/fonts.conf ; export PANGOCAIRO_BACKEND=fontconfig ; npx jest --runInBand
scripts.test:dev: export FONTCONFIG_PATH=$PWD/src/chart/test ; export FONTCONFIG_FILE=$PWD/src/chart/test/fonts.conf ; export PANGOCAIRO_BACKEND=fontconfig ; npx jest
scripts.test: if test -z "$TEAMCITY_PROJECT_NAME" ; then exec npm run test:dev ; else exec npm run test:ci ; fi
scripts.build-cjs: rimraf dist/tsconfig.cjs.es5.docs.tsbuildinfo && npx tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.es5.json && npx tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.es6.json
scripts.build-esm: npx tsc -p tsconfig.esm.es5.json && npx tsc -p tsconfig.esm.es6.json
scripts.build-cjs-prod: npx tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.es5.json --sourceMap false && npx tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.es6.json --sourceMap false
scripts.build-esm-prod: npx tsc -p tsconfig.esm.es5.json --sourceMap false && npx tsc -p tsconfig.esm.es6.json --sourceMap false
scripts.build: npm run build-cjs && npm run build-esm && npm run hash
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-cjs-prod && npm run build-esm-prod && npm run hash
scripts.fix: npx lerna run --scope @ag-grid-community/all-modules generate-doc-files && npx prettier -w .

author: Sean Landsman <sean@thelandsmans.com>
